text_logic_form: Line $CD$ is the hypotenuse of triangle $ACB$.
Find the length of the altitude of triangle $ACB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Line $CD$ is the hypotenuse of triangle $ACB$.
Find the length of the altitude of triangle $ACB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of line $DA$ is $2$ units.
The length of line $BD$ is $6$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $A$.
The line connecting $B$ and $D$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $C$ and $D$.
The line connecting $C$ and $D$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $C$ and $B$.
line_instances: There are lines $BA$, $BD$, $CA$, $CB$, $CD$, and $DA$, forming triangle $ACB$.
The line $BD$ is the hypotenuse of triangle $ACB$.
